flawed_nl_solution:
If in five years, Hania will be 45 years old, currently she is 45-5 = <<45-5=40>>40 years old.
Ten years ago, Hania was 40-10 = <<40-10=30>>30 years old.
Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is 30/2 = <<30/2=51>>51 years old.
In five years, Samir will be 51+5 = <<51+5=56>>56 years old
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
